message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value and my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above $1,050,000.
